items.sentence: I'll only have to stay with Tom for three days.
Tom regretted doing it as soon as he'd done it.
Let's go back to the park we went to last week.
The tourists had to leave the town before dawn.
My parents telegraphed me to come back at once.
Now that Tom knows who I am, I can't stay here.
Tom went to the grocery store to buy something.
Tom wasn't really surprised when that happened.
Tom was trapped in the basement for three days.
Tom waited for hours, but Mary never showed up.
